alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:08PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Owyhee County through 245 PM MDT... At 208 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Big Horse Basin Gap to near Frying Pan Spring. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Big Horse Basin Gap and The Hat around 210 PM MDT. Bruneau Canyon Viewpoint, Turner Butte and Pot Hole Butte around 240 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
